sentences.en: A bee sits on a sunflower in the garden.
sentences.cn: 一只蜜蜂栖息在花园中的一棵葵花上.

sentences.en: Buy: Citric acid, Soy sauce , Beans, Sunflower seeds, Food additive.
sentences.cn: 采购: 柠檬酸, 酱油,大豆, 瓜子, 食物添加剂.

sentences.en: By summer's end, kids will have a sunflower house to play in.
sentences.cn: 到夏末的时候, 孩子们就可以到葵花屋里面玩耍了.

sentences.en: Do you know how to turn a simple sunflower seed into a piece of delicious meat?
sentences.cn: 你知道怎么把一个简单的向日葵花籽变成一片片美味的肉吗？

sentences.en: Every time you look a sunflower, the whole world starts to smile.
sentences.cn: 每次看见向日葵, 全世界都开始微笑.

sentences.en: For example , the sunflower belongs to the species Helianthus annuus.
sentences.cn: 植物的属名和种加词都要用拉丁文和斜体印刷.

sentences.en: He was spitting out the husks of sunflower seeds on the floor.
sentences.cn: 他把瓜子皮吐在地板上.

sentences.en: However, in facing the public sunflower flowers, not pessimistic, still boldly blooming.
sentences.cn: 但葵花面对众花, 不悲观, 依旧大胆地绽放.

sentences.en: Jasmine, Saving Face and Sunflower will be released in 2005.
sentences.cn: 《茉莉花开》、《面子》以及《向日葵》将于2005年发行放映.

sentences.en: Sunflower cultivation to be promoted to meet cooking oil needs.
sentences.cn: 向日葵的栽种将扩大以满足于食品用油的需要.

sentences.en: Sunflower margarine has the same fat content as butter.
sentences.cn: 向日葵所制人造黄油的脂肪含量与黄油脂肪含量相同。

sentences.en: The bird pecked seeds out of the sunflower.
sentences.cn: 那只鸟用喙从向日葵中啄出种子.

sentences.en: The gods were deeply touched and changed her into a sunflower.
sentences.cn: 众神为她的痴情所深深打动,将她变成了一株向日葵.

sentences.en: The oil can come from animal fat or plant sources like avocado, coconut or sunflower.
sentences.cn: 油可以来自动物脂肪或者植物来源，比如鳄梨椰子或者向日葵。

sentences.en: The oil can come from animal fat or plant sources like avocado, coconut or sunflower.
sentences.cn: 由可以来自动物脂肪或者植物来源，比如鳄梨椰子或者向日葵。

sentences.en: The sunflower blushed to own the nameless flower as her kin.
sentences.cn: 向日葵羞于把无名的花朵看作它的同胞.

sentences.en: We are making you an inquiry for Sunflower seeds.
Why are the florets in a sunflower arranged in double spiral?
sentences.cn: 为什么向日葵中的小花是按照双螺旋的形状排列的 呢 ?

phrases.tran_cn: 香瓜子，葵花子；向日葵籽

trans.tran_cn: 向日葵，葵花籽，向日葵色
trans.tran_en: a very tall plant with a large yellow flower, and seeds that can be eaten
